summary: Itransition is seeking a Python ML/AI Engineer to work on an innovative AI Assistant application. The role involves developing LLM-based features and optimizing RAG pipelines. Candidates should have strong experience with Python and be familiar with LangChain, OpenAI API, and prompt engineering. The position offers flexibility in work arrangements, competitive compensation, and opportunities for career development.
skills:

| OpenAI API                             | Proficient     |                                   |
| Prompt engineering                      | Solid          | Background required               |
| RAG systems                            | Solid          | Background required               |
| Embeddings                             | Experience     | With vector databases             |
| Vector databases                       | Experience     |                                   |
| AWS Bedrock                            | Nice to Have   | Additional preferred experience   |
